service.name: Eyebrow Wax

seo.title: Eyebrow Waxing in Westfield & Carmel, IN | RELUXE Med Spa
seo.description: Clean, shaped brows that frame your face—fast and precise. Option to pair with a facial for ultra-smooth skin.

overview.p1: Crisp, custom brow shaping that frames your features without over-thinning.
overview.p2: We consult on your ideal shape, remove hair gently, and finish with soothing products for calm skin.

whyReluxe.title: Face-framing shapes
whyReluxe.body: Arches tailored to your bone structure—not trends.

whyReluxe.title: Gentle technique
whyReluxe.body: Careful waxing and calming finish for minimal redness.

whyReluxe.title: Fast + consistent
whyReluxe.body: Quick appointments with the same polished result every time.

service.tagline: Clean, shaped brows that frame your face.

howItWorks.title: Consultation
howItWorks.body: We review your goals, history, and design a personalized plan.

howItWorks.title: Treatment
howItWorks.body: Quick, precise session performed by our experts.

howItWorks.title: Aftercare
howItWorks.body: Simple steps for best results. We check in with you.

flexEverything.intro: A tidy, custom brow shape in minutes.

items.heading: Pro tip
items.body: Pair with a facial for ultimate smooth skin.

faq.a: Most patients describe mild, brief discomfort. We can use numbing when appropriate.
Some results are immediate; full effect often appears by 1–2 weeks depending on service.
